message: Welcome to our store! I'm offering a product for $100 today. With a 50% chance of being high-quality, it could be worth up to $300 to you if it's the good one. Given the uncertainty, let's make sure the value aligns with your expectations. Would you like to take a chance on this unique opportunity?
I'll take the chance, I'm excited to see if I get the high-quality product!

Hello there! I'm delighted to present another product for $100. This time, there's a 50% chance it's of high quality, potentially worth $300 to you. With such a great deal, it's an exciting opportunity to possibly gain significant value. Are you ready to seize this chance?
I'd like to buy the product, but I'm only willing to pay $50, considering the 50% chance it might be low quality and worthless to me.
